title: Student health center revolving fund
context: [ยง304A-2255] Student health center revolving fund. There is established the student health center revolving fund for the student health center from which shall be paid the cost of operations of the student health center services and that shall be replenished through charges made for medical services and other related goods and services or through transfers from other accounts or funds. [L 2006, c 75, pt of ยง2]
